elements.name: Hydrogen
elements.properties: Colorless, odorless gas. Lightest element, highly flammable.

elements.name: Helium
elements.properties: Colorless, odorless gas. Lowest boiling point, used in balloons.

elements.name: Lithium
elements.properties: Soft, silvery metal. Highly reactive, used in batteries.

elements.name: Beryllium
elements.properties: Hard, brittle metal. Low density, used in alloys.

elements.name: Boron
elements.discovered_by: Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac, Louis Jacques Thénard
elements.properties: Metalloid. Important for plants, used in semiconductors.

elements.name: Carbon
elements.properties: Basis of organic chemistry, found in all living organisms.

elements.name: Nitrogen
elements.properties: Colorless, odorless gas. Most abundant in Earth's atmosphere.

elements.name: Oxygen
elements.properties: Colorless, odorless gas. Supports combustion and life.

elements.name: Fluorine
elements.properties: Highly reactive gas. Used in toothpaste and water fluoridation.

elements.name: Neon
elements.properties: Colorless, inert gas. Used in neon signs.

elements.name: Sodium
elements.properties: Highly reactive metal. Used in salts and as a reagent.

elements.name: Magnesium
elements.properties: Lightweight, silvery metal. Used in alloys and as a supplement.

elements.name: Aluminum
elements.properties: Lightweight, corrosion-resistant metal. Used in various applications.

elements.name: Silicon
elements.properties: Metalloid. Key component of most minerals and rocks.

elements.name: Phosphorus
elements.properties: Non-metal. Essential for life, used in fertilizers and matches.

elements.name: Sulfur
elements.properties: Non-metal. Forms various compounds, distinctive smell.

elements.name: Chlorine
elements.properties: Halogen gas. Strong disinfectant, used in water treatment.

elements.name: Argon
elements.properties: Colorless, inert gas. Used in various applications.

elements.name: Potassium
elements.properties: Highly reactive metal. Used in salts and as a reagent.

elements.name: Calcium
elements.properties: Essential for life, forms bones and teeth. Used in various applications.

elements.name: Scandium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in alloys and electronic devices.

elements.name: Titanium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Strong, lightweight metal. Used in aerospace and medical implants.

elements.name: Vanadium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in steel alloys and as a catalyst.

elements.name: Chromium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Hard, corrosion-resistant. Used in alloys.

elements.name: Manganese
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in steel production and batteries.

elements.name: Iron
elements.properties: Transition metal. Essential for making steel, found in hemoglobin.

elements.name: Cobalt
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in batteries, alloys, and medical applications.

elements.name: Nickel
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in alloys, coins, and plating.

elements.name: Copper
elements.properties: Transition metal. Good conductor of electricity, used in wiring and coins.

elements.name: Zinc
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in galvanizing and as an essential trace element.

elements.name: Gallium
elements.properties: Metal. Low melting point, used in semiconductors.

elements.name: Germanium
elements.properties: Metalloid. Used in semiconductors and fiber optics.

elements.name: Arsenic
elements.properties: Metalloid. Poisonous, used in semiconductors and wood preservation.

elements.name: Selenium
elements.properties: Non-metal. Used in electronics and photovoltaic cells.

elements.name: Bromine
elements.properties: Halogen. Red-brown liquid, used in flame retardants.

elements.name: Krypton
elements.properties: Noble gas. Used in lighting and lasers.

elements.name: Rubidium
elements.properties: Alkali metal. Reactive, used in research and some specialized batteries.

elements.name: Strontium
elements.properties: Alkaline earth metal. Used in fireworks, pyrotechnics, and alloys.

elements.name: Yttrium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in alloys and electronics.

elements.name: Zirconium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in alloys, ceramics, and nuclear applications.

elements.name: Niobium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in alloys and superconductors.

elements.name: Molybdenum
elements.properties: Transition metal. High melting point, used in steel alloys.

elements.name: Technetium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Radioactive, used in medical imaging.

elements.name: Ruthenium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in electronics and catalysis.

elements.name: Rhodium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Reflective and corrosion-resistant. Used in jewelry and catalysis.

elements.name: Palladium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in catalysis, electronics, and jewelry.

elements.name: Silver
elements.properties: Transition metal. Valuable, excellent conductor of electricity.

elements.name: Cadmium
elements.discovered_by: Karl Samuel Leberecht Hermann, Friedrich Stromeyer
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in batteries and coatings.

elements.name: Indium
elements.properties: Post-transition metal. Used in electronics and semiconductors.

elements.name: Tin
elements.properties: Post-transition metal. Used in alloys and coatings.

elements.name: Antimony
elements.properties: Metalloid. Used in flame retardants and alloys.

elements.name: Tellurium
elements.properties: Metalloid. Used in electronics and solar cells.

elements.name: Iodine
elements.properties: Halogen. Purple-black solid, used in medicine and sanitation.

elements.name: Xenon
elements.properties: Noble gas. Used in lighting and lasers.

elements.name: Cesium
elements.properties: Alkali metal. Reactive, used in atomic clocks.

elements.name: Barium
elements.properties: Alkaline earth metal. Used in X-ray imaging and fireworks.

elements.name: Lanthanum
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in batteries and camera lenses.

elements.name: Cerium
elements.discovered_by: Martin Heinrich Klaproth, Jöns Jacob Berzelius
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in catalysts, glass, and fireworks.

elements.name: Praseodymium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in magnets and lasers.

elements.name: Neodymium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in magnets, lasers, and glass.

elements.name: Promethium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Radioactive, used in atomic batteries.

elements.name: Samarium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in magnets and catalysts.

elements.name: Europium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in phosphors and nuclear reactors.

elements.name: Gadolinium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in MRI contrast agents and neutron capture.

elements.name: Terbium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in phosphors and electronic devices.

elements.name: Dysprosium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in magnets and lasers.

elements.name: Holmium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in lasers and nuclear reactors.

elements.name: Erbium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in lasers, fiber optics, and nuclear applications.

elements.name: Thulium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in medical imaging and lasers.

elements.name: Ytterbium
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in lasers and medical devices.

elements.name: Lutetium
elements.discovered_by: Georges Urbain, Carl Auer von Welsbach
elements.properties: Lanthanide. Used in medical imaging and catalysts.

elements.name: Hafnium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in nuclear reactors and high-temperature applications.

elements.name: Tantalum
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in capacitors and high-temperature applications.

elements.name: Tungsten
elements.properties: Transition metal. Very high melting point, used in filaments and alloys.

elements.name: Rhenium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Used in high-temperature alloys.

elements.name: Osmium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Densest naturally occurring element.

elements.name: Iridium
elements.properties: Transition metal. Corrosion-resistant, used in high-temperature applications.

elements.name: Platinum
elements.properties: Transition metal. Valuable, used in jewelry and catalysts.

elements.name: Gold
elements.properties: Transition metal. Valuable, used in jewelry and electronics.

elements.name: Mercury
elements.properties: Transition metal. Liquid at room temperature, used in thermometers and lighting.

elements.name: Thallium
elements.properties: Post-transition metal. Used in electronics and medical imaging.

elements.name: Lead
elements.properties: Post-transition metal. Dense and corrosion-resistant, used in batteries and shielding.

elements.name: Bismuth
elements.properties: Post-transition metal. Brittle, used in cosmetics and medications.

elements.name: Polonium
elements.properties: Metal. Radioactive, highly toxic.

elements.name: Astatine
elements.discovered_by: Dale R. Corson, Kenneth Ross MacKenzie, Emilio Segrè
elements.properties: Halogen. Radioactive and rare.

elements.name: Radon
elements.properties: Noble gas. Radioactive and colorless.

elements.name: Francium
elements.properties: Alkali metal. Highly radioactive and rare.

elements.name: Radium
elements.properties: Alkaline earth metal. Radioactive and luminescent.

elements.name: Actinium
elements.properties: Actinide. Radioactive and silvery-white.

elements.name: Thorium
elements.properties: Actinide. Radioactive, used in nuclear reactors.

elements.name: Protactinium
elements.properties: Actinide. Radioactive, used in nuclear reactors.

elements.name: Uranium
elements.properties: Actinide. Radioactive, used in nuclear reactors and weapons.

elements.properties: Actinide. Radioactive, used in nuclear reactors.

elements.properties: Actinide. Radioactive, used in nuclear reactors and weapons.
